discourse_list.title: The development of loans in Blockchain - ERC1068

content.content: Hi everyone, I am Diego, currently a student of Law and Business in Madrid. During the last months I have been very interested in the development of loans in Blockchain. I have been studying the ERC1068 and companies like AAVE. However, I think that we are far to discover de formula of a decentralized platform for the loans. Maybe because two problems:  The necessity to identify the borrower and the lender. The necessity to keep a collateral. So, if someone knows resources, information, or just want to share their opinion, let me know.  Thanks so much.
